agentCard.name: Universal Input Sanitizer Agent
agentCard.description: Universal Input Sanitizer - Complete Rewrite: Comprehensive input sanitization with 99%+ threat detection accuracy. Protects against SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, command injection, LDAP injection, and encoding attacks using proven 2025 security patterns.
